Title: 3.2 Do Not Store Sensitive Authentication Data After Authorization

Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 3.2

==Policy Statement==

Do not store sensitive authentication data after authorization.

==Policy Purpose==

Do not store sensitive authentication data after authorization to limit the potential damage caused by a successful attack.

==Related Guidance==

* [[c05b8c53-3f76-4569-b212-177d5a208b00|Do Not Store Particularly Sensitive Cardholder Data]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[fd15d30d-8132-48fc-8962-870f096eff3b|Particularly Sensitive Cardholder Data Is Not Stored]]
